name: environment_scenario_get_the_details_of_a_specific_application_deployed
description: Test case for: As a user, I want to get the details of a specific application deployed in a Cyoda environment.

parts.text: get the details of a specific application deployed in a Cyoda environment.

I can fetch that — I just need the environment and app name first.

- Which environment? (e.g., `dev`, `staging`, `prod`)
- Which application name (exact app namespace)?

Once you provide those I will run check_environment_exists() and then return the app details (and highlight Build ID / Status / URLs).

[options-single-choice: Provide Environment & App Name, List Environments, Cancel]
